attributes.action: Ask the that Ice Hockey in the United Kingdom be recognised as a national sport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We think that Ice Hockey in the UK should be recognised as a National Sport and the Governing Bodies get together to provide proper leadership as its is frgmented in as much as there are too many controling bodies running it.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Ask the that Ice Hockey in the United Kingdom be recognised as a national sport."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11952.asp

Prime Minister's Office
